name: Prosper Production Company
tag_list: video-production-services, video-production-in-kentucky, video-production-in-lexington-kentucky, world-equestrian-games-video, lexington-videography, wedding-video, training-videos, promotional-videos, nonprofit-video-production, video-editing-services, d
overview:
Welcome to the exciting world of Prosper Media Group a multimedia video production company providing services including: television, corporate, promotional and Internet business solutions, with clients including National Kidney Foundation, US Marines, VoicePad, Lexington Legends, ESPN, iHigh, US Navy Seals and the University of Kentucky. The Prosper Production Company was established in 1998 in Trenton, NJ and incorporated in 2004 in Lexington, KY.

The mission of the Prosper Media Group is to continue providing a Professional Response and On-going Service in Production, Efficiency and Reliability. The Prosper Media Group delivers affordable professional multimedia marketing to any business of any size including educational institutions and nonprofit organizations. Through strategic partnerships the diversity of our services is unlimited. Our core competency is and will always be providing personal and sincere customer service.
